alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Leflore; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 8:43AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SUNFLOWER...GRENADA AND LEFLORE COUNTIES THROUGH 930 AM CDT... At 842 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Bruce to near Paynes to 7 miles west of Parchman. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grenada and Parchman around 850 AM CDT. Drew, Holcomb, and Bew Springs around 855 AM CDT. Minter City around 900 AM CDT. Ruleville, Gore Springs, and Leflore around 905 AM CDT. Elliott, Sunnyside, and Misterton around 910 AM CDT. Money around 915 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
